name: Adventure System
overview: Adventure System is a program in which the user can create their own text adventure games for the Commodore 64. It was developed by Jörg Walkowiak. It was originally published in Germany by Data Becker in the book "Adventures - und wie man sie programmiert" and then was translated to English and published in 1985 by Abacus Software in the book "Adventure Gamewriter's Handbook for Commodore 64". Despite this, the title screen for the North American release still says 1984.
